title: Artificial Intelligence Concepts: An Introduction (Online)
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: This course provides an essential introduction to AI topics, including historical development, theoretical foundations, modern applications, and ethical implications. It aims at professionals and those with no prior knowledge of AI.

title: Oxford Artificial Intelligence Programme
description: Designed for managers, business leaders, and technical professionals, this programme offers a comprehensive exploration of AI and machine learning. It covers AI mechanics, potential, challenges, social implications, and ethics.

title: Oxford Executive Diploma in Artificial Intelligence for Business
description: This diploma programme equips executives and technical specialists with tools to ethically leverage AI in their organisations. It covers technological disruption, big data and machine learning, AI in practice, and strategic leadership.

title: Technology and AI: Online Courses
platform: Oxford University Department for Continuing Education
description: These online courses provide flexible learning options covering various aspects of AI and technology, designed for professionals and those with no prior knowledge of AI.
